Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Because of the appropriate HOMO and LUMO energy levels , an effective balance was produced.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO energy levels |
| LUMO energy levels |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| HOMO energy levels |
| LUMO energy levels |

These entities refer to the Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital (HOMO) and Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital (LUMO) energies, which are material properties related to the electronic structure of a molecule or material.

These are the only entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to material properties and have associated values. HOMO (Highest Occupied Molecular Orbital) and LUMO (Lowest Unoccupied Molecular Orbital) energy levels are material properties that describe the energy levels of the electrons in a molecule.
